holidays.name: National Popcorn Day
holidays.description: A day to celebrate the crunchy, buttery, and oh-so-delicious popcorn ‚Äì the ultimate movie snack! Grab a bowl and snack away!
holidays.origin: The exact origin is unknown, but popcorn has been a popular snack since the early 1900s in the United States, and this day was created to honor it.
holidays.funFact: Popcorn kernels can pop up to 3 feet in the air due to the pressure inside the kernel heating up!

holidays.funFact: Despite 43 quintillion possible configurations, any Rubik‚Äôs Cube can be solved in 20 moves or less‚Äîthe ‚ÄòGod‚Äôs Number.‚Äô

holidays.name: Citizen‚Äôs Day (South Africa)
holidays.description: A day dedicated to celebrating active citizenship and encouraging all South Africans to contribute positively to their communities and country.
holidays.origin: Established to promote civic responsibility and awareness among South African citizens.
holidays.funFact: Citizen‚Äôs Day in South Africa includes community clean-ups, volunteering, and educational activities to strengthen social bonds.

holidays.name: National Popover Day
holidays.description: Shine a spotlight on the tall, hollow, and delightfully airy popover‚Äîa quirky cousin to the Yorkshire pudding enjoyed with butter and jam or savory fillings.
holidays.origin: Popovers have been a part of American cuisine since colonial times, and this day celebrates this unique baked treat.
holidays.funFact: Popovers 'pop over' the edges of the pan as they bake, creating their signature puffy shape!
